description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. www.snake360.com - Fast-paced arcade-style Snake game with 300 levels, 9 game modes including battle modes for up to 4 players, a Goal Board with 12 unlockable features, Internet Ranking, full 3D graphics and a pumping soundtrack from SCI Recordings featuring almost 30 minutes of music!  Many hours of fun and challenge...a great value!
